Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: H. Rodas Barrera
Reviews.Content: This is great! The camera works great and takes excellent pictures, and the frame is in my desk showing all my pictures with great detail!

Reviews.Title: Very, pleased to find this product and get it.
Reviews.Author: Ida E. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I had looked all over for a polaroid digital camera but could not find one. I was very happy when I found it on Amazon, that was the first time I had ever been on Amazon but won't be the last.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 MP Digital Camera (Black)
3x Optical Zoom 4x Digital Zoom
6" Digital Photo Frame (Black)
Reads SD, MS and MMC
USB Port
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid i830 - Digital camera - compact - 8.0 Mpix - optical zoom: 3 x - supported memory: MMC, SD, SDHC - black - with Polaroid DPA-0600 6" Digital Photo Frame
